adu wahana wala gunathmaka bhawaya pilibanda nirantharayen nanguna paminili menma , adhi wegi marga athulu supiri marga paddhathiyakin yuth shri lankawe maha margayanhi ewani bala wargaye wahana daknata labima rate prathirupayata barapathala haniyak bawada wishleshakayan wisin penwa di thibe.emenma mema badu ihala damima haraha purna washayen indiyanu nishpadana wana bala wargaye wahana sandaha merata welanda pola sampurnayenma ahimi wana athara maruti susuki, bajaj wani indiyanu motar ratha samagam wasi yame hakiyawakda pawathina athara , emagin rakiya ahimi wana laksha sankhyatha indiyanu janathawa haraha erata rajayata prabhala wirodhayak thulin mathu kirima magin manawa himikam samuluwedi dakwu adhirajya wadi batahira gathi piliwethata wirodhaya pala kirima me thula sangawunu thawath deshapalanika aramunak bawa jathyanthara deshapalana wicharakayin wisin pawasa siti .
